actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator McClure. With written report No. 98-12.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 30.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Budget.

official_title: An original bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain property to the city of Show Low, Arizona.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in certain tracts of land known as David C. Porter Park and Show Low Municipal Airport to the city of Show Low, Arizona.

titles.title: An original bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain property to the city of Show Low, Arizona.
